animeDescription: The world's first 4K anime.The short's story centers on a boy who finds something shining in a gloomy desert. It gives him a power of light. Guided by the light, the boy is drawn into the connection between the girl he meets and a new world. It was made in collaboration with with Singapore-based blockchain company BlockPunk. The short utilized a new type of production system with blockchain crowdfunding. (Source: ANN)
